testcase.name: Logging
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When User enters valid email address "wp900622@gmail.com" into the email field.passed And User enters valid password "12345" into the password field..............passed And User clicks on the login button.........................................passed Then user should be logged in...............................................passed

testcase.name: Logging in with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When User enters valid email address "wp900622@gmail.com" into the email field.passed And User enters invalid password " " into the password field................passed And User clicks on the login button.........................................passed Then user should get an error message about invalid credentials.............passed

testcase.name: User registers with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the register page....................................passed When user enters "John" into the first name field...........................passed And user enters "Doe" into the last name field..............................passed And user enters "johndoe@gmail.com" into the email field....................passed And user enters "123456789" into the telephone field........................passed And user enters "123456" into the password field...........................passed And user enters "123456" into the password confirm field....................passed And user clicks on the privacy policy checkbox..............................passed And user clicks on the continue button......................................passed Then user should be registered successfully.................................passed

testcase.classname: Add new item to the cart
testcase.name: Add new item to the cart
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to the Phones&PDAs page.................................passed When I click on the iPhone link.............................................passed And I enter 1 in the quantity field.........................................passed And I click on the Add to cart button.......................................passed Then I should see the Item added to cart message............................passed And I click cart button.....................................................passed Then I should see the item in the cart......................................passed
